TITLE: Episode 132 - Getting Old Fashioned with Monica Perez
DESCRIPTION: This week, your dearly loved hostess Jessica Green is out and the lovely Monica Perez from the Propaganda Report is filling in for her. She's so used to dissecting the news and getting past the bald-faced lies and we'll delve into what's really happening. Join us for a good time and probably a cocktail or two.
